ygData.subject: FYI: Big CVS merge
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve just merged a large body of work that had been in a separate CVS branch back into the main branch. Most notably, many classes have been moved or renamed,

I've just merged a large body of work that had been in a separate CVS
branch back into the main branch.

Most notably, many classes have been moved or renamed, and the configuration
"crawl order" file structure is much changed -- matching what was presented
during the IIPC meetings in SF. See the "dev-crawl" directory for an example.

Other example/testing configurations and the web crawler admin UI have NOT
yet been updated for the new-style order file and processor chain.

There are many other changes -- fixing some bugs, surely introducing others.
A more detailed note about the changes is coming soon, after a chance for
some discussion and cleanup work here.

- Gordon
